translations: n.批评；评论（criticism 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: She was reduced to tears by their criticisms.
sentences.translation: 他们的批评使她流下了眼泪。

sentences.sentence: Her criticisms had the effect of discouraging him completely.
sentences.translation: 她的批评使他完全丧失了信心。

sentences.sentence: He spent most of his speech rebutting criticisms of his foreign policy.
sentences.translation: 他大部分的演讲都用来反驳他在外交政策上受到的各种批评。
